document_data.caption: A group of [[human]] [[warrior]]s take on a pyrohydra inside a cave.
document_data.name: Pyrohydra
document_data.mainbody: The '''pyrohydra''' ({{Plural|pyrohydrae|refs=}} {{Plural|pyrohydras|alt=yes|refs=}}) was a variety of [[hydra]] that could breathe jets of fire, in a cone, from each of its heads.

Ecology.Habitats:
Pyrohydras were typically found in the [[Peaks of Flame]] in [[Chult]] and the [[Fire Marsh]]es of [[High Moor]]. 

They were also native to the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]].

document_data.History: Amidst the havoc of [[Halaster's Higharvestide]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, a pyrohydra passed from Undermountain through the ''[[Sojourner's Portal]]'' into the crypts below the [[Temple of Old Night]].
